scripts.test: npm -w apps/web test && npm -w libs/shared test
scripts.test:ci: npm -w apps/web test -- --runInBand --verbose && npm -w libs/shared test -- --runInBand --verbose
scripts.test:python:ci: cd services/api && PYTHONHASHSEED=0 python -m pytest tests/ -v --tb=short
scripts.test:all:ci: npm run test:ci && npm run test:python:ci
scripts.audit:all: npm run audit && npm run audit:python
